ActNational Energy Board Act
SubjectIssuance of Licence GL-330 - LNG Canada Development Inc.
PrecisOrder approving the ISSUANCE by the National Energy Board of Amending Order A0-001-GL-330 to vary the expiry date for first exports provided by Condition 3 of Licence GL-330 from December 31, 2022 to December 31, 2027.
